page.title: 11HINCKLEY SUPERSTORE
page.content: MR and MRS J.CHAMBERLAIN own a shop. It sells sweets,drinks,bread,milk, grocery foods, meats and fresh veg etc. The shop is open seven days a week and his shop has been there one year.They get about two hundred customers a day. Mr.Chamberlain has worked as a shop keeper for three years. The shop is open eleven hours a day.His wife helps him as well as two other helpers. In all the years he has been a shopkeeper he has only caught one person stealing. His shop is called J.+ M. Superstore. He advertises things in his shop window. His shop is about 21ft x 28ft.He has not got another job and he likes his work very much.He has a car and his shop is very popular.
